document.full_text: italian fashion house prada is pricing its initial public offering in hong kong to raise up to $2.6 billion and give the maker of luxury bags and miu miu dresses a higher valuation than its european peers.
document.title: prada eyes $2.6 billion ipo, tops european peer values
lines_and_colors: italian fashion house prada is pricing its initial public offering in hong kong to raise up to $2.6 billion and give the maker of luxury bags and miu miu dresses a higher valuation than its european peers.
